team_info.hpp
1 #pragma once
2 
3 #include <rj_protos/referee.pb.h>
4 
5 #include <rj_common/time.hpp>
6 #include <rj_msgs/msg/team_info.hpp>
7 #include <string>
8 #include <vector>
9 
10 // Information about a single team.
11 class TeamInfo {
12 public:
13  using Msg = rj_msgs::msg::TeamInfo;
14 
15  // The team's name (empty string if operator has not typed anything).
16  std::string name;
17  // The number of goals scored by the team during normal play and overtime.
18  int score = 0;
19  // The number of red cards issued to the team since the beginning of the
20  // game.
21  size_t red_cards = 0;
22  // The amount of time (in microseconds) left on each yellow card issued to
23  // the team.
24  // If no yellow cards are issued, this array has no elements.
25  // Otherwise, times are ordered from smallest to largest.
26  std::vector<RJ::Seconds> yellow_card_times;
27  // The total number of yellow cards ever issued to the team.
28  size_t yellow_cards = 0;
29  // The number of timeouts this team can still call.
30  // If in a timeout right now, that timeout is excluded.
31  size_t timeouts_left = 0;
32  // The duration of timeout this team can use.
33  RJ::Seconds timeout_time{0};
34  // The pattern number of this team's goalie.
35  uint8_t goalie = 0;
36 
37  bool operator==(const TeamInfo& other) const {
38  return name == other.name && score == other.score &&
39  red_cards == other.red_cards &&
40  yellow_card_times == other.yellow_card_times &&
41  yellow_cards == other.yellow_cards &&
42  timeouts_left == other.timeouts_left &&
43  timeout_time == other.timeout_time && goalie == other.goalie;
44  }
45 
46  bool operator!=(const TeamInfo& other) const { return !(*this == other); }
47 
48  static TeamInfo from_refbox_packet(const SSL_Referee_TeamInfo& packet) {
49  TeamInfo info;
50  info.name = packet.name();
51  info.score = packet.score();
52  info.red_cards = packet.red_cards();
53  info.yellow_cards = packet.yellow_cards();
54  info.yellow_card_times.resize(info.yellow_cards);
55  for (int i = 0; i < packet.yellow_card_times_size(); i++) {
56  info.yellow_card_times[i] =
57  std::chrono::microseconds(packet.yellow_card_times(i));
58  }
59  info.timeouts_left = packet.timeouts();
60  info.timeout_time = std::chrono::microseconds(packet.timeout_time());
61  info.goalie = packet.goalie();
62  return info;
63  }
64 };
65 
66 namespace rj_convert {
67 
68 template <>
69 struct RosConverter<TeamInfo, rj_msgs::msg::TeamInfo> {
70  static rj_msgs::msg::TeamInfo to_ros(const TeamInfo& from) {
71  rj_msgs::msg::TeamInfo to;
72  convert_to_ros(from.name, &to.name);
73  convert_to_ros(from.score, &to.score);
74  convert_to_ros(from.red_cards, &to.num_red_cards);
75  convert_to_ros(from.yellow_cards, &to.num_yellow_cards);
76  convert_to_ros(from.yellow_card_times, &to.yellow_card_remaining_times);
77  convert_to_ros(from.timeouts_left, &to.timeouts_left);
78  convert_to_ros(from.timeout_time, &to.remaining_timeout_time);
79  convert_to_ros(from.goalie, &to.goalie_id);
80  return to;
81  }
82 
83  static TeamInfo from_ros(const rj_msgs::msg::TeamInfo& from) {
84  TeamInfo to;
85  convert_from_ros(from.name, &to.name);
86  convert_from_ros(from.score, &to.score);
87  convert_from_ros(from.num_red_cards, &to.red_cards);
88  convert_from_ros(from.num_yellow_cards, &to.yellow_cards);
89  convert_from_ros(from.yellow_card_remaining_times,
90  &to.yellow_card_times);
91  convert_from_ros(from.timeouts_left, &to.timeouts_left);
92  convert_from_ros(from.remaining_timeout_time, &to.timeout_time);
93  convert_from_ros(from.goalie_id, &to.goalie);
94  return to;
95  }
96 };
97 
98 ASSOCIATE_CPP_ROS(TeamInfo, TeamInfo::Msg);
99 
100 } // namespace rj_convert
